name: Order and Space
description:
Actually on development Order and Space

We are a couple of 15 y/o guys learning Unity3D, Lua, Love2D and More... to make videogames and other things, we are not getting any compensation of this so if you want to support us please donate to contribute to our dreams of making videogames :)

Also, if you don't want to donate you can still support us telling your friends about our work :)

(Prototype made on Construct2 only for trailer and testing some animations, the game is currently developed in Unity3d 5.6)

(All game assets are made by Kenney, you can get it on Kenney.nl, licensed under Public Domain but remember to atribute it to him :) )

TYSM for making free assets Kenney, keep doing a good work :) 

5% Done

V-0.1

FEATURES THAT COME IN THE NEXT VERSION V-0.1

-Menu

-Endless Mode

-Options & Credits 

FULL GAME FEATURES

-Fully Editable ship

-Editable Shooting Lasers

-Damage animations

-Power Ups

-History Mode

-Survival Mode

-More effects

-Easter Eggs

-More...
